description:
Tuxedo Kamen is a fictional character and one of the primary protagonists of the Sailor Moon metaseries. He disguises himself in order to support the series` central heroines, the Sailor Senshi.
Wearing a mask to conceal his identity, he interferes with enemy operations, offers the Senshi advice, and sometimes physically aids them in battle.
Like the Senshi, Tuxedo Mask possesses a power item like theirs: a Sailor Crystal, which gives him guardianship over the planet Earth.
Source: wiki
name: Tuxedo Kamen
